phrases: So we are in the same class this year, too?
If you are happy about it, Ri-chan, I am, too.
Now that you mention it, where is he?
Well do not you look chipper!
Are you that happy about being in class 10 with all the rowdy kids?
He is not used to being split into a different class from his friends.
You have got a petal in your hair...
I am so happy we are in the same class again!
We just did self-introductions in there...
You set up his ticket for the sleeper, too, did not you?
He said to keep it a secret from you...
Because of that, I had a nice trip.
We should have decided the class rep by drawing lots in the first place...
Hey, I heard there is already a fight in class 10!
I am just glad I was not put in there!
Hey, are you done already, Boxing Club?!
I thought you had a little more spirit than that.
Why are you fighting on the first day of the new school year?!
Been too long since I had a fight.
You are going over there with that banged-up face?!
Sorry, but would you take this guy to the infirmary and patch him up?
Ri-chan, he is in your hands.
The pain will go away and I should be able to relax and smile again.
I am going to submit this painting to this year's public exhibition.
This is the one Sentaro-kun modeled for.
You do not have to force yourself to give me feedback.
I do not know much about art...
That is a strange thing for you to say.
After all, painting and jazz are relatively close cousins, are not they?
A painting is created on a space called the canvas,
while jazz is created during a time called the performance.
It is like etching your living self into that place and time.
Junichi-san was talking about that when I went down to the basement.
It is very interesting to listen to him.
I would like to talk to him more about all kinds of things.
Um... I went to Tokyo during spring break...
And I dropped by Brother Jun's boarding house, but he was not there...
Apparently, he had not been back for a long time,
so there were a lot of letters stuffed in his mail slot...
Someone said he might be staying over at another person's place...
One of those letters may have been important...
Just put a little spit on cuts like these and they will heal up fine.
What will you do if it gets infected?
Ri'ko... I am glad you are in the same class as Richie.
From now on, would you look after him more instead of me?
Um, well, I would better get going...
Glad I caught up to you before you went home...
This glob looks like a tear...
That is the tear of a broken heart.
In Greek mythology, the god Apollo
fell in love with Daphne, the daughter of a river god.
He became obsessed and chased her all around, but she would not stop running.
At last, she gave Apollo the ultimate rejection
by turning into a bay laurel tree.
What an awful case of heartbreak!
He is so grief-stricken that he fashions a wreath out of the laurel tree!
This is Matsuoka Seiji-kun, a second-year student.
He is the Great Hope of East High's Art Club.
We are both in class 10, huh?
Do you remember that guy from last year?
Are you free on our next day off?
I want to get you a present as thanks for being my model.
I could never see this guy wearing a laurel wreath!
That is unusual for someone as level-headed as you, Ri-chan.
I am careless as can be.
I get more absent-minded in the spring, but better snap out of it...
It is from The Sound of Music.
Yeah, I figured you would like that movie, Ri-chan.
Oh, no, I did not see it.
I wanted to, but before I knew it, it would already stopped playing.
I bet it was a good movie, huh?
I guess I thought I would be able to see it anytime...
No, better not... I had my shot...
Oh yeah, there was something I wanted your advice about, Richie.
Well then, I will give the perfect advice to a romantic beginner like you.
On a one-on-one date, you are sure to freeze up and blow the whole deal.
D-Do not you make fun of me!
I can handle a date, piece of cake!
You really think you can keep TPO in mind
in front of that princess and behave accordingly?!
But for your own sake, you better not go.
I wish everyone would just stop falling in love...
Well, do not blame me for what happens!
Tell me if you see something you want.
I never get expensive stuff like this.
Even this jacket is a hand-me-down from Brother June..
And from then on, all we talked about was Brother June..
When Brother Jun was in high school, nobody was cooler!
He was good at fightin', smart too...
We had a good time talkin' about him...
A date is a piece of cake for you, huh?
It did not go well at all, did it?
Stay away from her from now on.
What makes you say that all of a sudden?
You really are dense, are not you?
Any way you look at it, you and a refined girl like that just do not match up.
It is what you call being out of your depth...
I heard you went on a date with Yurika?
She said she had a great time.
She said you were handsome, Kawabuchi-kun,
and that maybe she will hold your hand next time!
Oh, Richie, you are here, huh?
Hey, you want to try playin'
I thought he would be mad at me for what I said at lunch,
but he seems to be in a great mood.
I thought only jazz was allowed in here...
Oh, that kid with the mushroom cut, Matsuoka, forced it on me...
I could not refuse, so I just carried it here.
Good for you, making a nice friend that lends you records...
Would you come upstairs a second?
What, did a new record come in?
Is he... going to listen to that record?
What am I so anxious about?
Did you listen to the record I gave you yesterday?
Nah, I cannot get into music that has girls squealin' over it...
Is not that the purpose of making music?
Do not you want to become popular?
Do not really care about that...
Well, I want to be popular.
My dream is to become a star!
Are those the underpants of somebody who aims to be a star?!
I have got a lot of brothers, so if I do not stake my claim like this,
they will disappear in a hurry.
And we are poor, so we cannot afford to buy new ones often.
Amongst all my brothers, I am called the good-for-nothing.
Really, singing is the only thing I am good at...
I want to prove that I can become somebody who is able to support his family.
To me, this band is the first step.
Alright, now all we need is a drummer.
Seiji, are you going to tell me who it is you have in mind?
Oh, you will find out soon enough.
No school tomorrow, so if you are free, want to go to the beach?
Ma told me to take the munchkins.
But lookin' after them alone is a tough job,
so I thought I would ask you along to help out.
What do you say we have us a clammin' contest at the sea?!
Is it some kind of competition?
Clamming means digging up clams at the beach.
It is confusing when this guy calls it a contest or whatever...
This is going to be fun!
I will need to mentally prepare myself this time.
If those two have a romantic moment...
Oh, it is a pleasure to meet you.
What cute little girls and boys.
You know, there is a place over there where you can find a lot of razor clams.
I have heard about you from Yurika.
She said you were exceptionally cute!
Oh, they are right over here.
Do not criticize the guy when you do not know'i am.
Looks like they are having a good time over there.
For some reason, that Matsuoka character rubs me the wrong way...
I will be back in a bit!
You were surprised when the crab pinched you, right?
Thank goodness that is all it was!
Do not tell me your drummer is Kawabuchi!
He is not as scary as you think he is.
All I have to do is set him free from what is tying him down
and then everything should work out the way I want it to.
I am good at this kind of simple task.
Well, I are not going to lose neither!
What do I get if I win?!
How about the record that Ri-chan's dad gave you?!
Because I am going to win anyway!
Kawabuchi-kun, did you listen to it?
Did it stir up your interest?!
I would not go that far.
I am thinkin' I will help you out with
that band you are going to have for the school festival.
You will join my rock band?!
I am just going to be away'til the festival's over with.
We are just going to be apart for a while, Nishimi-kun.
Let us send each other letters, okay?
I was wrong about you, traitor!
I do not want to listen to you!
I do not need you anymore.
I acted like an angry little kid.
But being separated from him scares the hell out of me...
Since coming here, I would forgotten
that I am not good at getting along with other people...
After all, I have made it this far all on my own...
Look at the end of the counter!
